abstract: Mike Hale reviews DVD release of 1979 television adaptation of John le Carre's book Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy.
snippet: With a feature film of John le Carré’s “Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy” to open in December, there’s still time to discover or revisit the 1979 TV version, which starred Alec Guinness as George Smiley.
lead_paragraph: With a feature film of John le Carré’s “Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy” to open in December, there’s still time to discover or revisit the 1979 TV version, which starred Alec Guinness as George Smiley.

headline.main: Spycraft Dispensed With Appropriate, Deliberate Speed
headline.print_headline: Spycraft Dispensed With Appropriate, Deliberate Speed
headline.seo: ‘Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy,’ With Alec Guinness - Review
